org.utils.naga.images.filters.libs

类 GaussianFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.utils.naga.images.filters.libs.AbstractBufferedImageOp
      • org.utils.naga.images.filters.libs.ConvolveFilter
        • org.utils.naga.images.filters.libs.GaussianFilter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class GaussianFilter
extends ConvolveFilter
    A filter which applies Gaussian blur to an image. This is a subclass of ConvolveFilter which simply creates a kernel with a Gaussian distribution for blurring.
    作者:
    Jerry Huxtable

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.utils.naga.images.filters.libs.ConvolveFilter

    • 方法详细资料

      • setRadius

        public void setRadius(float _radius)
        Set the radius of the kernel, and hence the amount of blur. The bigger the radius, the longer this filter will take. min-value 0 max-value 100+
        参数:
        _radius - 像素点的模糊半径(0~100+)
        另请参阅:
        getRadius()

      • getRadius

        public float getRadius()
        Get the radius of the kernel.
        返回:
        模糊半径
        另请参阅:
        setRadius(float)

      • convolveAndTranspose

        public static void convolveAndTranspose(java.awt.image.Kernel kernel,
                                        int[] inPixels,
                                        int[] outPixels,
                                        int width,
                                        int height,
                                        boolean alpha,
                                        boolean premultiply,
                                        boolean unpremultiply,
                                        int edgeAction)
        Blur and transpose a block of ARGB pixels.
        参数:
        kernel - the blur kernel
        inPixels - the input pixels
        outPixels - the output pixels
        width - the width of the pixel array
        height - the height of the pixel array
        alpha - whether to blur the alpha channel
        premultiply - [waiting...]
        unpremultiply - [waiting...]
        edgeAction - what to do at the edges

      • makeKernel

        public static java.awt.image.Kernel makeKernel(float radius)
        Make a Gaussian blur kernel.
        参数:
        radius - the blur radius
        返回:
        the kernel
